{{cpp/utility/functional/copyable_function/title|operator bool}}
{{cpp/utility/functional/copyable_function/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++26|
explicit operator bool() const noexcept;
}}

Checks whether {{c|*this}} stores a callable target, i.e. is not empty.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
{{c|true}} if {{c|*this}} stores a callable target, {{c|false}} otherwise.
